summary: The HellFire mod creates 3 Bows all powerfull enough to oneshot kill any mob out there but including a special little perks.
descriptionHtml:
The HellFire mod creates 3 Bows all powerfull enough to oneshot kill any mob out there. These bows though also have a special characteristic like filling a soul gem, marking your kill for 15 seconds, and the chance to turn someone undead


=======================Location==========================================
River wood inn behind the counter on a barrel
author: rmuench
